body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Keith Bennett and the customer's name is Elizabeth Miller.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am with Bright Connections. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Sarah. I'm looking for some information about your services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! Could you please provide me with your email address so I can send you more details?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could I also have your phone number for any follow-up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my phone number is two zero three, five four five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John! I will make sure to send you the details shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Sarah, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, John! Thank you for your time, and have a wonderful day!
